titleStmt.title: The wise vieillard, or old man. Translated out of French into English by an obscure Englishman, a friend and fauourer of all wise old-men
Sage vieillard. English
titleStmt.author: Goulart, Simon, 1543-1628.
Williamson, Thomas, 1593-1639.
T. W., obscure Englishman.

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: T.W., i.e. Thomas Williamson?.
At end: "End of the first volume". No more published.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
